title: Bug 7752: Export multiple files with same file name under different directories to zip file fails.
description:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Launch WSWB and create two projects
2. Under each project, create a new file with the same name (such as 'foo.txt')
3. From the main menu, select File > Export and select Zip File to export
4. [Additional steps not provided]
OB: The zip file should be able to store files with the same name under different directories.
EB: When exporting multiple files with the same name but under different directories to a zip file, the exported zip file fails to store all the files correctly.
SR: Please investigate and fix the issue that causes the zip file export to fail when it contains multiple files with the same name but under different directories.
